title: European Journal of Palliative Care
text:
The European Journal of Palliative Care is the official <a href="medical%20journal">journal</a> of the <a href="European%20Association%20for%20Palliative%20Care">European Association for Palliative Care</a>. It publishes articles on the latest advances in <a href="palliative%20care">palliative care</a> in Europe and facilitate communication between healthcare professionals working in the field.
The founding editor was <a href="Geoffrey%20Hanks">Geoffrey Hanks</a>.
